page.title: 19INDUSTRY
page.content: { The old Creamery was opened in 1921. {During the early 1930's it was closed {but in 1935 it was reopened as a {modern creamery. } The 15 bulk tankers collect milk from 400 farmers.There farms cover an area from Rhyl to Cerrigydrudion,and from Corwen to Mold,and to Holywell.In May the daily intake of milk increases to 350,000 litres.To make 1 tonne of cheese you need 10,000 litres of milk.The creamery produces about 35 tonnes daily. In one year approx. 10,000 Tonnes of cheese and 600 Tonnes of butter are produced. There are 150 people working at the creamery. {Cheeses produced:_} Cheddar,Chesire,Double Gloucester, Red Leicester,Derby,Cheddar(Chives & Onion),Cheddar(smoked),Sage Derby.
